abstract: Barnes & Noble on Tuesday fended off a proxy challenge from billionaire investor Ron Burkle, holding on to the seat held by its chairman, Len Riggio, left.
snippet: Barnes & Noble on Tuesday fended off a proxy challenge from billionaire investor Ron Burkle, holding on to the seat held by its chairman, Len Riggio, left.
lead_paragraph: 9:52 p.m. | Updated Michael J. de la Merced has more in The New York Times.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble Wins Battle for Board

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
